meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing a carbonyl group bonded to at least one hydrogen atom.
meanings.sent1: Aldehydes are organic compounds found in nature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study aldehydes to understand their chemical properties.
meanings.sent3: The aldehydes in the lab were having a party, bonding with hydrogen atoms.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like aldehydes, always bonding ideas together.
meanings.sent5: The smell of aldehydes in the air was unmistakable, like a mix of freshness and chemistry.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound used in various industrial processes and in the production of plastics and pharmaceuticals.

meanings.sent3: The aldehydes in the factory were working hard, creating new materials.
meanings.sent4: His words were like aldehydes, shaping the conversation into something new.
meanings.sent5: The aldehydes in the production line danced together, forming the basis of modern materials.
